208.sentence: great phone , easy to use , excellent network , no regrets ! ! !

209.sentence: i purchased this phone for just 50 $ and there is no end to what i can do with it .

210.sentence: nokia and t-mobile really teamed up well on this baby .

211.sentence: service is great as far as i can tell , features work like a charm , ringtones are high quality if you buy them from t-mobile and aim is great .

212.sentence: this is probably your best bet if you are looking for a phone in this price range , or like me , do not have the patience to deal with annoying flip phones .

213.sentence: 1 month , no problems , great phone i 'm very pleased with my 6610 phone .

215.sentence: the speakerphone works better than any speakerphone i 've ever had .

216.sentence: the sound quality is excellent , except , maybe a * tad * too quiet at times when there are quieter talkers on the other end of the line .

217.sentence: the included earpiece is very comfortable and easy to use .

218.sentence: i have not had any distortion problems with this phone and am more pleased with this phone than any i 've used before .

219.sentence: first let me say that it is much smaller than it looks on the web and it also looks better .

220.sentence: the radio feature has superb sound quality .

221.sentence: it has a classic design yet looks hip .

222.sentence: it is extremely light and dissapears in your pocket .

223.sentence: the battery is alot better than most of the phones out there .

224.sentence: this phone is great as a whole and is not like others with one or two good qualities .

225.sentence: the only problem that i have found with the internet service is that it does not access mls ( real estate broker software ) very well at all .

226.sentence: it does well in all aspects of internet browsing .

227.sentence: i find the lack of entertaining games on this phone quite disturbing .

228.sentence: battery life is good for a phone of this size .

229.sentence: but anyway , the only thing you should really look at here is the fact that the phone does have voice dialing .

231.sentence: the 6610 excels as a cell phone , thank god .

232.sentence: the voice quality is very good , and it gets great reception ( that is , in places where you get t-mobile coverage , which is not that good ; see below ) .

233.sentence: the color screen makes this free-after-rebates phone shine bright , and commands are very responsive .

234.sentence: my only gripe about the hardware is the buttons .

235.sentence: this model does have the traditional key arrangement , it 's just that they are really close to one another , and have unconventional shapes , so it takes a big getting used to for someone like me with big hands .

236.sentence: other than that , this is a perfect phone for those of us with no patience for flips .
